about_the_game:
Panda Magix : Golden Trains Edition is a 5 reel, 25 payline slot machine (pokie) with a Oriental theme oriented from left to right. - WITH THE SIMILAR LIGHTNING STRIKE FEATURE.
This new version is our second release with our new Golden Trains Feature.
Grab yourself a drink, sit back, play and enjoy. Now also with authentic background ambience recorded from a live venue to create a real atmosphere, just like you are actually at a casino.

Free game feature is awarded when 3 or more scatters appear on any line and is awarded 8 free games.
During free games any (6) six cash values on screen trigger the Golden Trains Feature.
During play any (6) six or more Golden Trains ( Symbols ) scattered anywhere on screen start the Golden Trains Feature..
During the Golden Trains Feature there will be 3 free spins, when an additional dollar value lands on screen it will re-trigger free spins back to 3 until no more coins land on screen, win Mini, Minor and Major jackpots when symbols land on screen.

To Win Grand Jackpot screen needs to have all 15 reels lite up with a winning value.
Scattered during Free spins paid or free cannot be retriggered during play.

This is the closest slot machine simulation you can get to the real thing, with features like, Reserve Button and Paytable.
Play Pokies4fun Slot Simulations at work or at home without losing a cent, Great Games Great Fun........
No real money can be won.
For Amusement Only. If you are looking for the best Australian slot machine games, then look no further than Pokies4fun. Pokies4fun is a leading provider of online and offline pokies for fun that are designed to entertain and thrill you. Pokies4fun offers a wide range of slot machine games with different themes, features, and jackpots.
